creditline: Gift of Juliann McGuire and Michael McGuire
description: two pieces sewn together; predominantly brown; one panel has wide red and blue stripe flanked by white, pink, blue and yellow thin stripes and pink and white patterned stripes with scrolls and X's; second panel has seven multicolored patterned stripes flanked by thin multicolored stripes and separated by wider pink and orange stripes; diamond pattern edging; warp faced plain weave with complementary warp patterning
title: Woman's ceremonial aksu (overskirt)
